summary: The second-highest ever CryptoPunk sale took place for 4,500 ETH, worth over $16 million, on March 4 on the CryptoPunks marketplace.
title: Second-most expensive CryptoPunk ever sells for 4,500 ETH, worth over $16 million
content: CryptoPunk #3100, one of nine so-called "Alien Punks," sold for 4,500 ETH -0.38% worth $16.03 million.

The sale is the second-highest CryptoPunk transaction ever in both U.S. dollar and ether terms, according to the CryptoPunks platform. The sale also moved CryptoPunk #3100 from the third- to second-highest ever sale on the marketplace.
The seller on March 4 outbid the previous offer of 4,250 ETH, valued at $14.56 million, placed on March 1.
CryptoPunk sales brought in a total of $8.25 million last week, according to data compiled by The Block.
